scripts.pretest: ./run-jshint.sh && ./run-browserify.sh && rm -f .sonar/issues-report/issues-report.html; if ! (sonar.sh status); then sonar.sh start && echo 'starting sonar server' && sleep 8; fi
scripts.test: istanbul cover -- _mocha -t 5000 test/*-test.js test/**/*-test.js 2>&1 && mocha -t 5000 test/integration-test-runner.js && sonar-runner -Dsonar.analysis.mode=preview -Dsonar.issuesReport.console.enable=true -Dsonar.issuesReport.html.enable=true |grep -v -e 'INFO' -e '======================================='
